TreeLogicFunction.Name: SubString
TreeLogicFunction.Description: Returns a specific number of characters from a text string, starting at the position you specify, based on the number of characters you specify.

Argument.Name: String
Argument.Description: The string that you want to extract the charachters from.

Argument.Name: StartNum
Argument.Description: The position of the first character you want to extract in String. The first character has a StartNum of 1.

Argument.Name: NumChars
Argument.Description: The number of characters that you want to return.
